The Challenge Network / Society
SPRING INTO ACTION with The Easter Challenge
{!Contact.FirstName}
This Easter The Challenge Society is bringing you the best bits of The Challenge – which is your favourite?
The Skills Challenge Comedy workshop being delivered by Soho Theatre. Learn comedy skills and be invited to perform these in front of an audience. When: 31st March Time: 11.30-5.00 Where: Get Involved: Text "Skills" to 07908948009
The Outdoor Challenge Come and get your hands dirty and help make a community classroom out of mud/straw and sand. Challenge Graduates have help build this classroom from scratch – come and join the effort! When: 1st April Time: 10.00-5.00 Where: Meet at Finsbury park station, Wells Terrace entrance and we’ll head to the Meadow Orchard together. Get Involved: Text "Outdoors 1" to 07908948009 OR Come and help Epping Forest get ready for spring! Clearing scrub and a free BBQ make for a great day for you to get your team together to come down! When: 5th April Time: 10.30-4.00 Where: meet at Leytonstone Underground Station and we'll walk the 5minutes to Epping Forest together. Get Involved: Text "Outdoors 2" to 07908948009
The Community Challenge Create a wall mural with Grafitti Artists to improve a community environment. When: 11th April Time: Where: Hugh Cubritt Community Centre Get Involved: Text "Community" to 07908948009
The Campaign Challenge There are more than 1 million young people out of work – don’t accept high young unemployment. Join us, big business, decision makers and hundreds of young people from across London to debate the issues and get practical help with next steps into employment, apprenticeships or education. When: 21st April Time: 10.00 to 4.30pm Where: LSBU Get Involved: You have to get a ticket for this event because it's open to all 14 - 19 year olds across London. Get your ticket here!
At The Campaign Challenge there will be a prize draw to win an ipod touch! For each challenge you complete, get an extra raffle ticket and get a better chance of winning the top prize!
Any questions, let me know.
